job_title: Director of Marketing and Residency Planning in State College, PA
pros: Foxdale Village has a great workplace culture. Leadership pays attention to salaries, benefits and team member growth. Having the opportunity to work with great staff and interact with phenomenal residents is a pleasure.
cons: I wish I'd found a career in senior living earlier!
